author: costin
msg: Minor changes - add the setter for jvmroute, remove a bit of GC in HttpResponse.

author: craigmcc
msg: Introduce the concept of "application root" for a Host, which will contain
the web applications directories for this host.  Defaults to "webapps".
Add a custom XmlAction that adds a LifecycleListener, and use it to
install EngineConfig, HostConfig, and ContextConfig listeners
automatically, without having to be mentioned in server.xml.
